name: Crowdy Planet
description:
Reach the stars with these little crowdies by using their best capacity : cloning

But be careful: each crowdy is unique and it's up to you to choose their evolution to grow up.

Instructions :  

Mouse left button (click) : Clone

Mouse right button (hold) : Kill

I have a trackpad : Hold Ctrl/Cmd + Mouse Left

Game made for LD 42.

Theme : Running out of space

Prog : @arche_san & NoPseudoYet

Art : NoPseudoYet

Music : Listen by Andrewkn (available on freesound)

SFX : @arche_san
